result.purpose: Utilities for fuzz testing JSON syntax in Go
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture with a focus on testing JSON parsing through fuzzing techniques.

json/fuzz/README.md.purpose: Documentation for JSON syntax fuzzing utilities in Go

json/fuzz/fuzz_test.go.purpose: This file contains a fuzz test for parsing JSON using the HashiCorp HCL library.
side_effects: Logs errors encountered during JSON parsing
risks: Potential for denial of service through malformed JSON input
